channel.title: Forum username change request (and can't login)
channel.description:
Hi,
Since moparscape.org is becoming something else, I want to visit moparisthebest.com. But when I login, it does not login me to completely so I can not visit my accounts/setting page. It just says signup or login at the top again.
So I am requesting my username be changed from "hhhzzzani" to "Hzn" (I want to keep my join date) and my account sorted out.
Hzn

item.title: Forum username change request (and can't login)
